author: Apple
description:
Life is chaotic. Paying shouldn’t be. Just use Apple Pay and be on your way. It works anywhere that takes contactless payments — from coffee shops and supermarkets to taxis and train stations. And yes, even at gas stations with particularly “challenging” attendants.

Learn more about Apple Pay: https://apple.co/4obcsuT

“KA-POW” by Cain Culto https://apple.co/4a6yJXe

#ApplePay   

Welcome to the official Apple YouTube channel. Here you’ll find news about product launches, tutorials, and other great content. Our more than 160,000 employees are dedicated to making the best products on earth, and to leaving the world better than we found it.
title: Apple Pay | Outrun | Apple
